verses.verse: "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G288>vine,<s%> and My <S%G3962>Father<s%> is the <S%G1092>vinedresser.<s%>

<S%G3956>"Every<s%> <S%G2814>branch<s%> in Me that does not <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> He <S%G142>takes<s%> <S%G142>away;<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> [branch] that <S%G5342>bears<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> He <S%G2508>prunes<s%> it, that it may <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>
"You are <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you.

<S%G3306>"Abide<s%> in Me, and I in you. As the <S%G2814>branch<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1438>itself,<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> it <S%G3306>abides<s%> in the <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> [can] you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Me.

"I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G288>vine,<s%> you are the <S%G2814>branches;<s%> he who <S%G3306>abides<s%> in Me, and I in him, he <S%G5342>bears<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit;<s%> for <S%G5565>apart<s%> from Me you <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>nothing.<s%> <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> does not <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Me, he is <S%G906>thrown<s%> <S%G1854>away<s%> as a <S%G2814>branch,<s%> and <S%G3583>dries<s%> up; and they <S%G4863>gather<s%> them, and <S%G906>cast<s%> them into the <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and they are <S%G2545>burned.<s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G3306>abide<s%> in Me, and My <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in you, <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G2309>wish,<s%> and it shall be <S%G1096>done<s%> for you.
"By <S%G3778>this<s%> is My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> that you <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> and [so] <S%G1096>prove<s%> to be My <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
<S%G2531>"Just<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G25>loved<s%> Me, I have <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> you; <S%G3306>abide<s%> in My <S%G26>love.<s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> you <S%G5083>keep<s%> My <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> you will <S%G3306>abide<s%> in My <S%G26>love;<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> My Father's <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> and <S%G3306>abide<s%> in His <S%G26>love.<s%>
<S%G3778>"These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, that My <S%G5479>joy<s%> may be in you, and [that] your <S%G5479>joy<s%> may be <S%G4137>made<s%> <S%G4137>full.<s%>
<S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> that you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you.

<S%G3173>"Greater<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> than <S%G3778>this,<s%> that <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> for his <S%G5384>friends.<s%>
"You are My <S%G5384>friends,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G1781>command<s%> you.

<S%G3765>"No<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> do I <S%G3004>call<s%> you <S%G1401>slaves,<s%> for the <S%G1401>slave<s%> does not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> his <S%G2962>master<s%> is <S%G4160>doing;<s%> but I have <S%G3004>called<s%> you <S%G5384>friends,<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> that I have <S%G191>heard<s%> from My <S%G3962>Father<s%> I have <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you.

"You did not <S%G1586>choose<s%> Me, but I <S%G1586>chose<s%> you, and <S%G5087>appointed<s%> you, that you should <S%G5217>go<s%> and <S%G5342>bear<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> and [that] your <S%G2590>fruit<s%> should <S%G3306>remain,<s%> that <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G302><s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> He may <S%G1325>give<s%> to you.
<S%G3778>"This<s%> I <S%G1781>command<s%> you, that you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
<S%G1487>"If<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> you, you <S%G1097>know<s%> that it has <S%G3404>hated<s%> Me <S%G4413>before<s%> [it hated] you.

<S%G1487>"If<s%> you were of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> would <S%G5368>love<s%> its <S%G2398>own;<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> you are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but I <S%G1586>chose<s%> you out of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> you.

<S%G3421>"Remember<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> that I <S%G3004>said<s%> to you, 'A <S%G1401>slave<s%> is not <S%G3173>greater<s%> than his <S%G2962>master.<s%>' <S%G1487>If<s%> they <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> Me, they will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1377>persecute<s%> you; <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G5083>kept<s%> My <S%G3056>word,<s%> they will <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5212>yours<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

"But <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> they will <S%G4160>do<s%> to you for My name's <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they do not <S%G3609>know<s%> the One who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.

<S%G1487>"If<s%> I had not <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to them, they would not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4392>excuse<s%> for their <S%G266>sin.<s%>
"He who <S%G3404>hates<s%> Me <S%G3404>hates<s%> My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> I had not <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G243>else<s%> <S%G4160>did,<s%> they would not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> they have <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G3404>hated<s%> Me and My <S%G3962>Father<s%> as <S%G2532>well.<s%>

"But [they have done this] in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> may be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> that is <S%G1125>written<s%> in their <S%G3551>Law,<s%> 'They <S%G3404>hated<s%> Me <S%G1431>without<s%> a <S%G1431>cause.<s%>'

<S%G3752>"When<s%> the <S%G3875>Helper<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I will <S%G3992>send<s%> to you from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> [that is] the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> from the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> He will <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of Me,
and you [will] <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G1510>been<s%> with Me from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%>
